title: Violet Fury
description: (THIS SHORT STORY EBOOK IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE.)Something is going terribly wrong in Bethany Cates' life right now. She's dreaming about someone else's life and is growing suspicious of the town she now lives in. But soon Bethany finds that something supernatural is working its way around Crest View and Bethany is discovering that her best friend and her enemy are projecting odd abilities that Bethany can't seem to put her finger on. What is going on? And most importantly... does Bethany even want to know?
author: Richard Paul Denney
